history.narrative: Law 8-193 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-384, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 25, 1990, and October 9, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 17, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-256 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
